Metadata.title: Culture, Digital Nomads, & Lifestyle | The Scrapbookers
Metadata.description: Pensieri e consigli di viaggio per nomadi digitali e amanti degli usi e costumi di culture straniere. Un blog per leggere storie su posti nuovi e a te sconosciuti.

Hero.title: No bucketlist. Just an ongoing adventure.
Hero.subtitle: This blog is a collection of our stories and adventures We never know where we will end up, but we're always sure that we will have a lot of fun along the way.
Hero.heroImgAlt: View of the Langtang Valley (Nepal) surrounded by mountains. In the front there is a small traditional house

ExhibitionBanner.title: Asia in Equilibrio, Tra Viaggio e Lavoro
ExhibitionBanner.description: Balancing travel and work, we found ourselves taking some shots in simple yet significant moments. Each shot does not aim to define an absolute truth, nor does it intend to distort reality; it is rather a fragment of our reflections, a visual tale of places that have transformed us.

HighlightSection.title: Currently travelling through Belize
HighlightSection.text: We are exploring the lush jungles, pristine beaches, and vibrant wildlife of Belize. From ancient Mayan ruins to the stunning Great Blue Hole, this country has captivated us with its natural beauty. Stay tuned for an upcoming article where we share our adventures and insights from this incredible destination!

AboutUs.title: A bit about us
AboutUs.textFirstPar: We began our travels in Southeast Asia at the beginning of 2023. We decided to experiment with our professional skills and shared passion for travel by designing and building a blog that could reflect our experiences, highlight overlooked historical events, and explore general subjects we found interesting along the way.
AboutUs.textSecondPar: Our slow travel pace has also rubbed off on our speed at producing content, but please be patient—we believe you will find our discoveries worth the wait. Join us here, in our newsletter, or on social media, and we'll help you feel like you're travelling to these places, from wherever you are.

Metadata.title: About Us, Discover More about our Story
Metadata.description: Nomadi digitali in viaggio: unisciti alle nostre avventure, scopri chi siamo, come viaggiamo e le sfide che affrontiamo lavorando in movimento!

description.part1: Siamo Beatrice e Davide, una graphic designer e uno sviluppatore software alla scoperta del mondo, partendo dal Sud Est Asiatico.
description.part2: Questi siamo noi nella giungla vicino a Chiang Mai, in Thailandia.

Generic.firstParagraph: Whilst working, journaling and taking photographs, we soon realised it was getting difficult to share all these things with family and friends, so, as a software engineer and a designer we thought we could easily set up a platform to share all this on. Ha! We didn't realise what we were in for.
Generic.secondParagraph: While living in London for 6 years we have met people from all over the place who, as well as making our stay there really special, have made us want to explore as much as possible. Funnily enough, the stories you hear are always the ones where things have gone badly wrong which are the ones people remember forever. We will never forget our time in Luang Prabang during the burning season, but although it wasn't what we had hoped for, we will always appreciate it as it showed us something we couldn't have imagined.
Generic.thirdParagraph: We are interested in learning from cultures which are new to us, try new foods and discovering new cooking techniques and utensils, discovering parts of history which we were never taught at school, seeing how different religions influence entire communities and meeting people who live here and others who are just travelling like us.
Generic.fourthParagraph: We can't spend all our time socialising though, as we are working too. Actually, it's only fair, as it's what is allowing us to travel non-stop. We are flexible and don't have a travel itinerary, but one of the cons/pros about having to work whilst travelling is that fast Wifi is about the only thing you need (as well as electricity of course) and sometimes this forces us to have to stay in bigger towns or cities for longer and miss out on the smaller and more remote ones, unless it's just a weekend trip.
Generic.fifthParagraph: We are trying to go on fewer flights as possible and travel mainly by train, bus and boat. We think that if we are able to stay in places for longer we can also spend more time getting there. You get a good view of the scenery around you too!
Generic.sixthParagraph: Stiamo inoltre cercando di limitare il più possibile i viaggi aerei, preferendo treni, autobus e navi. Crediamo fermamente che, avendo la possibilità di restare in un luogo per periodi più lunghi, possiamo anche permetterci di impiegare più tempo per raggiungerli. Oltre ad avere un impatto ambientale minore, ci consente di immergerci ed ammirare il paesaggio che ci circonda durante il tragitto, di certo non qualcosa da sottovalutare!
